text: haey banda anak del ban phiesakhluon knong meakra robsa a l laoh kraoypi puokke trauv ban ke thveubeab yeung pitchea nung phdal kanleng snaknow yeang la brasaer dl puokke nowknong lokey nih . haey champoh phalbony now thngai barlok vinh ku thomtheng cheang nih tow tiet brasenbae puokke( puok del thveubeab ke) ban doeng
